name: Game 1 (funnbot, ArdenDoesArt)
description:
Do you want to destroy all minimalistic art! Then download Game 1!
Fight Piet's minimalistic bugs with your paintbrush and diagonals!
Finally, bring down the reign of Piet and end all minimalism forever!

Controls

WASD to walk around.

Space to shoot.

Esc to escape.

Credits

Programming: Funnbot (https://funnbot.itch.io/)
Art: Arden (https://itch.io/profile/ardendoesart)
Music: Viv G.
